DataElement.preferredDefinition: Diagnostic tests fail to detect presence of disease._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: No Evidence of Disease Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Diagnostic tests fail to detect presence of disease._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Diagnostic tests fail to detect presence of disease.

Concepts.definition: Diagnostic tests fail to detect presence of disease.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Survivors must have no eviden
ReferenceDocuments.description: Survivors must have no evidence of disease at the time of last medical visit for all cancers, except non-melanoma skin disease.

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF 1801 v4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients with prior malignancies if all treatment for that malignancy was completed at least 2 years before registration and the patient has no evidence of disease.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: There is no evidence of contralateral disease on CT or MRI of the neck.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_02
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has no evidence of contralateral nodal disease as confirmed by PET/CT within 8 weeks prior to the date of randomization?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient must be disease-free at the time of registration.
